mapper.sql:
SELECT A1.*,
CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenNum - currMonRecNum - nextMonRecNum END AS currMonYetRecNum, CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenRMB - currMonRecRMB - nextMonRecRMB END AS currMonYetRecRMB,
CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenNum - currMonRecNum END AS currMonDiffNum, CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenRMB - currMonRecRMB END AS currMonDiffRMB,
lastMonSenNum - lastMonLastRecNum - lastMonRecNum AS lastMonYetRecNum, lastMonSenRMB - lastMonLastRecRMB - lastMonRecRMB AS lastMonYetRecRMB,
lastMonSenNum - lastMonLastRecNum AS lastMonDiffNum, lastMonSenRMB - lastMonLastRecRMB AS lastMonDiffRMB, C1.CATEGORY_NO AS ONE_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NO, C1.NAME AS ONE_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NAME, C2.CATEGORY_NO AS TWO_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NO, C2.NAME AS TWO_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NAME, LE1.NAME AS YEARSNAME, LE2.NAME AS SEASONNAME, LE4.NAME AS ORDERFROMNAME, LE3.NAME AS GENDERNAME FROM ( SELECT A.FAS_BILL_CODE, A.BALANCE_TYPE_NAME,A.BILL_NO, CASE WHEN A.BILL_TYPE='1304' THEN '1301' WHEN A.BILL_TYPE='1372' THEN '1371' ELSE A.BILL_TYPE END AS BILL_TYPE, A.ZONE_NO,A.ZONE_NAME,A.BUYER_NO,A.BUYER_NAME,A.ORGAN_NO,A.ORGAN_NAME,A.ORDER_UNIT_NO,A.ORDER_UNIT_NAME, A.ZONE_NO_FROM,A.ZONE_NAME_FROM,A.SALER_NO,A.SALER_NAME,A.ORGAN_NO_FROM,A.ORGAN_NAME_FROM,A.ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,A.ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM, A.ITEM_NO,A.ITEM_CODE,A.ITEM_NAME,A.BRAND_NO,A.BRAND_NAME,A.BRAND_UNIT_NO,A.BRAND_UNIT_NAME,A.CATEGORY_NO,A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.YEARS,A.SEASON,A.ORDERFROM,A.GENDER, A.SEND_DATE,MAX(A.RECEIVE_DATE) AS RECEIVE_DATE,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS currMonSenNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS currMonSenRMB,
SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE NOT in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) + SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS currMonRecNum, SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE NOT in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) + SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS currMonRecRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS nextMonRecNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS nextMonRecRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS lastMonSenNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS lastMonSenRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS lastMonLastRecNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS lastMonLastRecRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS lastMonRecNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS lastMonRecRMB FROM ( SELECT FAS_BILL_CODE, CASE
WHEN(BILL_TYPE IN ('1301', '1333') AND BALANCE_TYPE <> 4 AND BUYER_NO IN ) THEN '总部厂商'
WHEN (1=2) THEN '总部其他入库'
WHEN((BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1372' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) ) THEN '地区采购'
WHEN ((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1333' AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) ) THEN '总部代采'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '1372' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区间'
WHEN ((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33') AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33', '12', '34') AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) ) THEN '地区自购'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '2006' AND BIZ_TYPE = '36' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区其他入库' ELSE '未知类型' END AS BALANCE_TYPE_NAME, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = '1304' THEN REF_BILL_NO ELSE ORIGINAL_BILL_NO END AS BILL_NO, BILL_TYPE, ZONE_NO,ZONE_NAME,BUYER_NO,BUYER_NAME,ORGAN_NO,ORGAN_NAME,ORDER_UNIT_NO,ORDER_UNIT_NAME, ZONE_NO_FROM,ZONE_NAME_FROM,SALER_NO,SALER_NAME,ORGAN_NO_FROM,ORGAN_NAME_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM, ITEM_NO,ITEM_CODE,ITEM_NAME,BRAND_NO,BRAND_NAME,BRAND_UNIT_NO,BRAND_UNIT_NAME,CATEGORY_NO,CATEGORY_NAME, YEARS,SEASON,ORDERFROM,GENDER, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_SEND_BILL, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1304','1333','2006','1372') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BUYER_NO IN ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_RECEIVE_BILL, SEND_DATE, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = '1333' OR (BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BUYER_NO IN ) THEN SEND_DATE ELSE RECEIVE_DATE END AS RECEIVE_DATE, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333') THEN SEND_QTY ELSE RECEIVE_QTY END AS QTY, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333') THEN * SEND_QTY ELSE * RECEIVE_QTY END AS AMOUNT
FROM BILL_BUY_BALANCE WHERE 1=1
AND ( ((SEND_DATE OR SEND_DATE ) AND BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333')) OR(( (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE ) OR (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE ) OR (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE ) OR (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE )) AND BILL_TYPE IN ('1304','1372','2006')) ) AND (
(1=2)
OR (1=2)
OR OR OR OR
) UNION ALL SELECT FAS_BILL_CODE, CASE
WHEN (1=2) THEN '总部厂商'
WHEN ( (BILL_TYPE = '1335' AND BIZ_TYPE = '3') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1361' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('7', '25')) OR (BILL_TYPE = '2005' AND BIZ_TYPE = '35') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO IN ) ) THEN '总部其他入库'
WHEN ((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1')) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR BILL_TYPE = '1333' ) THEN '地区采购'
WHEN (1=2) THEN '总部代采'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区间'
WHEN (1=2) THEN '地区自购'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '2006' AND BIZ_TYPE = '36' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区其他入库' ELSE '未知类型' END AS BALANCE_TYPE_NAME, ORIGINAL_BILL_NO AS BILL_NO,BILL_TYPE, ZONE_NO,ZONE_NAME,BUYER_NO,BUYER_NAME,ORGAN_NO,ORGAN_NAME,ORDER_UNIT_NO,ORDER_UNIT_NAME, ZONE_NO_FROM,ZONE_NAME_FROM,SALER_NO,SALER_NAME,ORGAN_NO_FROM,ORGAN_NAME_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM, ITEM_NO,ITEM_CODE,ITEM_NAME,BRAND_NO,BRAND_NAME,BRAND_UNIT_NO,BRAND_UNIT_NAME,CATEGORY_NO,CATEGORY_NAME, YEARS,SEASON,ORDERFROM,GENDER, 1 AS IS_SEND_BILL, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1333','1335','1361','2005') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_RECEIVE_BILL, SEND_DATE, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1333','1335','1361','2005') THEN SEND_DATE ELSE RECEIVE_DATE END AS RECEIVE_DATE, SEND_QTY AS QTY, * SEND_QTY AS AMOUNT
FROM BILL_SALE_BALANCE WHERE 1=1
AND (SEND_DATE OR SEND_DATE ) AND (
(1=2)
(1=2)
(1=2)
(1=2) OR
OR (1=2) OR
OR (1=2) OR
) ) AS A GROUP BY A.BILL_NO,A.ITEM_NO ) AS A1 LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON LEFT(A1.CATEGORY_NO, 2) = C1.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON LEFT(A1.CATEGORY_NO, 4) = C2.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE1 ON A1.YEARS = LE1.CODE AND LE1.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'YEAR') LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE2 ON A1.SEASON = LE2.CODE AND LE2.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'SELL_SEASON') LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE3 ON A1.GENDER = LE3.CODE AND LE3.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'GENDER') LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE4 ON A1.ORDERFROM = LE4.CODE AND LE4.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'ORDER_STYLE')
((BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1372' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) )

((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1333' AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) )
(BILL_TYPE = '1372' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN )
((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33') AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33', '12', '34') AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) )
(BILL_TYPE = '2006' AND BIZ_TYPE = '36' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN )
((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1')) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR BILL_TYPE = '1333' )
(BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN )
(BILL_TYPE = '2006' AND BIZ_TYPE = '36' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN )
((BILL_TYPE = '1335' AND BIZ_TYPE = '3') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1361' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('7', '25')) OR (BILL_TYPE = '2005' AND BIZ_TYPE = '35') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO IN ) )

WHERE currMonSenNum <> 0 OR currMonSenRMB <> 0 OR currMonRecNum <> 0 OR currMonRecRMB <> 0 OR nextMonRecNum <> 0 OR nextMonRecRMB <> 0 OR currMonYetRecNum <> 0 OR currMonYetRecRMB <> 0 OR currMonDiffNum <> 0 OR currMonDiffRMB <> 0 OR lastMonRecNum <> 0 OR lastMonRecRMB <> 0 OR lastMonYetRecNum <> 0 OR lastMonYetRecRMB <> 0 OR lastMonDiffNum <> 0 OR lastMonDiffRMB <> 0
mapper.select:
/*balance*/ SELECT '合计:' AS zone_name, SUM(currMonSenNum) currMonSenNum, SUM(currMonSenRMB) currMonSenRMB, SUM(currMonRecNum) currMonRecNum, SUM(currMonRecRMB) currMonRecRMB, SUM(nextMonRecNum) nextMonRecNum, SUM(nextMonRecRMB) nextMonRecRMB, SUM(currMonYetRecNum) currMonYetRecNum, SUM(currMonYetRecRMB) currMonYetRecRMB, SUM(currMonDiffNum) currMonDiffNum, SUM(currMonDiffRMB) currMonDiffRMB, SUM(lastMonSenNum) lastMonSenNum, SUM(lastMonSenRMB) lastMonSenRMB, SUM(lastMonLastRecNum) lastMonLastRecNum, SUM(lastMonLastRecRMB) lastMonLastRecRMB, SUM(lastMonRecNum) lastMonRecNum, SUM(lastMonRecRMB) lastMonRecRMB, SUM(lastMonYetRecNum) lastMonYetRecNum, SUM(lastMonYetRecRMB) lastMonYetRecRMB, SUM(lastMonDiffNum) lastMonDiffNum, SUM(lastMonDiffRMB) lastMonDiffRMB FROM (
) temp_all_dtl
mapper.sql:
SELECT A1.*,
CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenNum - currMonRecNum - nextMonRecNum END AS currMonYetRecNum, CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenRMB - currMonRecRMB - nextMonRecRMB END AS currMonYetRecRMB,
CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenNum - currMonRecNum END AS currMonDiffNum, CASE WHEN A1.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504','FG13710404','FG13710504') AND (A1.SEND_DATE > A1.RECEIVE_DATE OR A1.SEND_DATE IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE currMonSenRMB - currMonRecRMB END AS currMonDiffRMB,
lastMonSenNum - lastMonLastRecNum - lastMonRecNum AS lastMonYetRecNum, lastMonSenRMB - lastMonLastRecRMB - lastMonRecRMB AS lastMonYetRecRMB,
lastMonSenNum - lastMonLastRecNum AS lastMonDiffNum, lastMonSenRMB - lastMonLastRecRMB AS lastMonDiffRMB, C1.CATEGORY_NO AS ONE_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NO, C1.NAME AS ONE_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NAME, C2.CATEGORY_NO AS TWO_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NO, C2.NAME AS TWO_LEVEL_CATEGORY_NAME, LE1.NAME AS YEARSNAME, LE2.NAME AS SEASONNAME, LE4.NAME AS ORDERFROMNAME, LE3.NAME AS GENDERNAME FROM ( SELECT A.FAS_BILL_CODE, A.BALANCE_TYPE_NAME,A.BILL_NO,A.ZONE_NO,A.ZONE_NAME,A.BUYER_NO,A.BUYER_NAME,A.ORGAN_NO,A.ORGAN_NAME,A.ORDER_UNIT_NO,A.ORDER_UNIT_NAME, A.ZONE_NO_FROM,A.ZONE_NAME_FROM,A.SALER_NO,A.SALER_NAME,A.ORGAN_NO_FROM,A.ORGAN_NAME_FROM,A.ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,A.ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM, A.ITEM_NO,A.ITEM_CODE,A.ITEM_NAME,A.BRAND_NO,A.BRAND_NAME,A.BRAND_UNIT_NO,A.BRAND_UNIT_NAME,A.CATEGORY_NO,A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.YEARS,A.SEASON,A.ORDERFROM,A.GENDER, A.SEND_DATE,MAX(A.RECEIVE_DATE) AS RECEIVE_DATE,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS currMonSenNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS currMonSenRMB,
SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE NOT in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) + SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS currMonRecNum, SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE NOT in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) + SUM(IF(A.FAS_BILL_CODE in ('FG13720404','FG13720504') AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS currMonRecRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS nextMonRecNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS nextMonRecRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS lastMonSenNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.IS_SEND_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS lastMonSenRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS lastMonLastRecNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS lastMonLastRecRMB,
SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.QTY,0)) AS lastMonRecNum, SUM(IF(A.SEND_DATE AND A.RECEIVE_DATE AND A.IS_RECEIVE_BILL = 1,A.AMOUNT,0)) AS lastMonRecRMB FROM ( SELECT FAS_BILL_CODE, CASE
WHEN(BILL_TYPE IN ('1301', '1333') AND BALANCE_TYPE <> 4 AND BUYER_NO IN ) THEN '总部厂商'
WHEN (1=2) THEN '总部其他入库'
WHEN((BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1372' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) ) THEN '地区采购'
WHEN ((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1') AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1333' AND IS_SPLIT IS NULL AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) ) THEN '总部代采'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '1372' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区间'
WHEN ((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33') AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33', '12', '34') AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) ) THEN '地区自购'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '2006' AND BIZ_TYPE = '36' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区其他入库' ELSE '未知类型' END AS BALANCE_TYPE_NAME, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = '1304' THEN REF_BILL_NO ELSE ORIGINAL_BILL_NO END AS BILL_NO, ZONE_NO,ZONE_NAME,BUYER_NO,BUYER_NAME,ORGAN_NO,ORGAN_NAME,ORDER_UNIT_NO,ORDER_UNIT_NAME, ZONE_NO_FROM,ZONE_NAME_FROM,SALER_NO,SALER_NAME,ORGAN_NO_FROM,ORGAN_NAME_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM, ITEM_NO,ITEM_CODE,ITEM_NAME,BRAND_NO,BRAND_NAME,BRAND_UNIT_NO,BRAND_UNIT_NAME,CATEGORY_NO,CATEGORY_NAME, YEARS,SEASON,ORDERFROM,GENDER, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_SEND_BILL, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1304','1333','2006','1372') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BUYER_NO IN ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_RECEIVE_BILL, SEND_DATE, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = '1333' OR (BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BUYER_NO IN ) THEN SEND_DATE ELSE RECEIVE_DATE END AS RECEIVE_DATE, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333') THEN SEND_QTY ELSE RECEIVE_QTY END AS QTY, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333') THEN * SEND_QTY ELSE * RECEIVE_QTY END AS AMOUNT
FROM BILL_BUY_BALANCE WHERE 1=1
AND ( ((SEND_DATE OR SEND_DATE ) AND BILL_TYPE IN ('1301','1333')) OR(( (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE ) OR (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE ) OR (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE ) OR (SEND_DATE AND RECEIVE_DATE )) AND BILL_TYPE IN ('1304','1372','2006')) ) AND (
(1=2)
OR (1=2)
OR OR OR OR
) UNION ALL SELECT FAS_BILL_CODE, CASE
WHEN (1=2) THEN '总部厂商'
WHEN ( (BILL_TYPE = '1335' AND BIZ_TYPE = '3') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1361' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('7', '25')) OR (BILL_TYPE = '2005' AND BIZ_TYPE = '35') OR (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO IN ) ) THEN '总部其他入库'
WHEN ((BILL_TYPE = '1301' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('0', '1')) OR (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) OR BILL_TYPE = '1333' ) THEN '地区采购'
WHEN (1=2) THEN '总部代采'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '1371' AND SALER_NO NOT IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区间'
WHEN (1=2) THEN '地区自购'
WHEN (BILL_TYPE = '2006' AND BIZ_TYPE = '36' AND SALER_NO IN AND BUYER_NO NOT IN ) THEN '地区其他入库' ELSE '未知类型' END AS BALANCE_TYPE_NAME, ORIGINAL_BILL_NO AS BILL_NO, ZONE_NO,ZONE_NAME,BUYER_NO,BUYER_NAME,ORGAN_NO,ORGAN_NAME,ORDER_UNIT_NO,ORDER_UNIT_NAME, ZONE_NO_FROM,ZONE_NAME_FROM,SALER_NO,SALER_NAME,ORGAN_NO_FROM,ORGAN_NAME_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM, ITEM_NO,ITEM_CODE,ITEM_NAME,BRAND_NO,BRAND_NAME,BRAND_UNIT_NO,BRAND_UNIT_NAME,CATEGORY_NO,CATEGORY_NAME, YEARS,SEASON,ORDERFROM,GENDER, 1 AS IS_SEND_BILL, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1333','1335','1361','2005') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_RECEIVE_BILL, SEND_DATE, CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('1333','1335','1361','2005') THEN SEND_DATE ELSE RECEIVE_DATE END AS RECEIVE_DATE, SEND_QTY AS QTY, * SEND_QTY AS AMOUNT
FROM BILL_SALE_BALANCE WHERE 1=1
AND (SEND_DATE OR SEND_DATE ) AND (
(1=2)
(1=2)
(1=2)
(1=2) OR
OR (1=2) OR
OR (1=2) OR
) ) AS A GROUP BY A.SALER_NO, A.BUYER_NO,A.ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM, A.ORDER_UNIT_NO ) AS A1 LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON LEFT(A1.CATEGORY_NO, 2) = C1.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON LEFT(A1.CATEGORY_NO, 4) = C2.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE1 ON A1.YEARS = LE1.CODE AND LE1.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'YEAR') LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE2 ON A1.SEASON = LE2.CODE AND LE2.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'SELL_SEASON') LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE3 ON A1.GENDER = LE3.CODE AND LE3.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'GENDER') LEFT JOIN LOOKUP_ENTRY LE4 ON A1.ORDERFROM = LE4.CODE AND LE4.LOOKUP_ID IN (SELECT LK.ID FROM LOOKUP LK WHERE LK.CODE = 'ORDER_STYLE')
mapper.select:
/*balance*/ SELECT '合计:' AS zone_name, SUM(currMonSenNum) currMonSenNum, SUM(currMonSenRMB) currMonSenRMB, SUM(currMonRecNum) currMonRecNum, SUM(currMonRecRMB) currMonRecRMB, SUM(nextMonRecNum) nextMonRecNum, SUM(nextMonRecRMB) nextMonRecRMB, SUM(currMonYetRecNum) currMonYetRecNum, SUM(currMonYetRecRMB) currMonYetRecRMB, SUM(currMonDiffNum) currMonDiffNum, SUM(currMonDiffRMB) currMonDiffRMB, SUM(lastMonSenNum) lastMonSenNum, SUM(lastMonSenRMB) lastMonSenRMB, SUM(lastMonLastRecNum) lastMonLastRecNum, SUM(lastMonLastRecRMB) lastMonLastRecRMB, SUM(lastMonRecNum) lastMonRecNum, SUM(lastMonRecRMB) lastMonRecRMB, SUM(lastMonYetRecNum) lastMonYetRecNum, SUM(lastMonYetRecRMB) lastMonYetRecRMB, SUM(lastMonDiffNum) lastMonDiffNum, SUM(lastMonDiffRMB) lastMonDiffRMB FROM (
) temp_all_total
